name: Be Brave, Bob! [early demo]
description:
Be Brave, Bob! is a cute but challenging game for the original Game Boy where you play as a bubble on a mission: To clean our polluted oceans. And, as any bubble, you float! The ocean is full of dangers, so be very careful.

This is an early demo, please follow the devlog to keep up to date with the game development.

You can play on your browser, or download the zipped .gb and .pocket roms.

CONTROLS

Game BoyComputerLeft/Right: Move left/right
A: Swim down
Start: PauseLeft/Right: Move left/right
Z: Swim down
Enter: Pause

Enjoy!
